name: decorator
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
UK a person whose job is to paint the inside or outside of buildings and to do other related work: a firm of painters and decorators
mainly US a person whose job is planning how the inside of a house, etc. will look, choosing the colour of the paint, the furniture, etc.: She started a business as an interior decorator.
